evoter.server.http.request

Class TestQuestionService

  • java.lang.Object
    • evoter.server.http.request.TestQuestionService

  • @ContextConfiguration(locations="classpath:applicationContextTest.xml")
public class TestQuestionService
extends java.lang.Object
    Make test cases for IQuestionService and QuestionService
    Author:
    btdiem

      void test_doCreate()
      Test for IQuestionService.doCreate(Map)
      Creating a question with its properties such as question test, question type
      creation date, creator user, sessionID and anwers
      Expect returning a SUCCESS message without an exception
      void test_doDelete()
      Test for IQuestionService.doDelete(Map)
      Delete question having question ID =1 and expect returning a SUCCESS message
      After finishing the transaction, expect searching a question having questionID=1 returning empty array
      void test_doEdit()
      Test for IQuestionService.doEdit(Map)
      Edit question text, answer text of question id=3
      Expect returning a SUCCESS message and the changes are updated after getting back

      Select all questions and their answers of session having sessionID=4 Expect returning an array of Question.toJSON() and Answer.toJSON()

      Test for IQuestionService.doGetLatest(Map)

      Get a sending status of a question of sessionID=2.
      void test_doSend()
      Test for IQuestionService.doSend(Map)
      Sending a question having questionID=1
      Expect returning a SUCCESS message and question status will changed to 1
      void test_doStopSend()
      Test for IQuestionService.doStopSend(Map)
      Stop sending question of sessionId=1
      Expect returning a SUCCESS message and question status of sessionId=1 is changed to 2

      Test for IQuestionService.doView(Map)
      Select question information having sessionID=1
      Expect returning Question.toJSON() array
